translations.The given language does not exist: The given language does not exist
translations.At least one of the given groups does no: At least one of the given groups does not exist
translations.The given icon does not exist: The given icon does not exist
translations.Provided file is not an image: Provided file is not an image
translations.Provided image is not a square of 16, 24: Provided image is not a square of 16, 24 or 32 pixels width
translations.An error occurred while uploading the ic: An error occurred while uploading the icon, please make sure the data directory is writable
translations.Add external sites to your Nextcloud nav: Add external sites to your Nextcloud navigation
translations.This application allows an admin to add:
This application allows an admin to add additional links into the Nextcloud menus.
Following a link, the external website appears in the Nextcloud frame.
It is also possible to add links only for a given language, device type or user group.

More information is available in the External sites documentation.
translations.Name: نام
translations.This site does not allow embedding: This site does not allow embedding
translations.Reloading icon list…: در حال بارگذاری مجدد لیست ایکون...
translations.Add a website directly to the app list i: Add a website directly to the app list in the top bar. This will be visible for all users and is useful to quickly reach other internally used web apps or important sites.
translations.A JSON Web Token containing user´s email: A JSON Web Token containing user´s email, uid and display name in its payload can be embedded into the link using the {jwt} placeholder. See the {linkstart}documentation{linkend} how to decode it.
translations.Please note that some browsers will bloc: Please note that some browsers will block displaying of sites via HTTP if you are running HTTPS.
translations.Furthermore please note that many sites: علاوه بر این به خاطر داشته باشید که امروزه بسیاری از سایت ها امکان iframing را به دلایل امنیتی غیرفعال کرده اند .
translations.We highly recommend to test the configur: We highly recommend to test the configured sites above properly.
translations.If you upload a test.png and a test-dark: If you upload a test.png and a test-dark.png file, both will be used as one icon. The dark version will be used on mobile devices, otherwise the white icon is not visible on the white background in the mobile apps.
translations.Uploading an icon with the same name wil: Uploading an icon with the same name will replace the current icon.
translations.The placeholders {email}, {uid} and {dis: The placeholders {email}, {uid} and {displayname} can be used and are filled with the user´s values to customize the links.
